description: I am a young, open-minded front-end developer from Przemyśl, Poland. My programming journey started back when I had been a teenager attending primary school. Back then, I took a fierce interest in game development, starting with simple games in the Unity game engine, based on C#. That interest soon grew into a hobby, which led into choosing a programming-related secondary school as the main focus of my education. Soon enough, with the help of my teachers, I grew more and more, learning various tools utilized in the industry. Today, I’m a full-fledged developer that hopes to make it big.
